text: a hydrant coupler. A hydrant coupler is a type of aircraft fueling equipment which opens and allows fuel to flow through the hydrant cart into the aircraft. A hydrant coupler needs 60lbs of air pressure to open up the pit valve to allow the flow of fuel. Hydrant couplers run off a pressure fueling system consisting of fuel and air pressure. ==References== *meggittfuelling.com *fluid-transfer.co.uk *groundsupportworldwide.com *beckerassociates.com Category:Fuels infrastructure
title: Hydrant coupler
